name: CToken
desc: Represents a class for handling JSON Web Tokens (JWT) using a JSON Web Key (JWK).

name: CToken
desc: Creates a new instance of CToken with the given key.

name: buildJWT
desc: Builds a JWT with the given claims.

name: verify
desc: Verifies the given JWT without decoding it.

name: verifyMore
desc: Verifies the given JWT and validates its claims.

name: CTokenBody
desc: Represents the body of a JWT with necessary claims.

name: client
desc: The audience of the JWT.

name: expSeconds
desc: The expiration time in seconds.

name: subject
desc: The subject of the JWT.

name: user
desc: The issuer of the JWT.
